name: Creole - DB abstraction for PHP5
short_description: Creole is a set of PHP classes that provide a database abstraction layer modeled on JDBC.  Built for PHP5, Creole is designed to provide a clean, fast, and fully object-oriented db access solution ideal for medium to large-scale PHP projects.
